org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSFileProvider

    org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs  

    • Uses of EncFSFileProvider in org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

      Classes in org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs that implement EncFSFileProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EncFSLocalFileProvider
      Class implementing an EncFSFileProvider for accessing the local filesystem Note that all path parameters are relative to the rootPath provided to the constructor.
      Methods in org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs that return EncFSFileProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EncFSFileProvider EncFSVolume.getFileProvider()
      Returns the file provider used for this volume

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void EncFSVolume.createVolume(EncFSFileProvider fileProvider, EncFSConfig config, String password)
      Creates a new EncFS volume on the supplied file provider using the requested EncFSConfig parameters and the given password
      static boolean EncFSVolume.isEncFSVolume(EncFSFileProvider fileProvider)
      Tests if the provided path contains EncFS volume
      static EncFSConfig EncFSConfigParser.parseConfig(EncFSFileProvider fileProvider, String path)
      Parse the configuration file residing on an EncFSFileProvider with the given path
      static void EncFSConfigWriter.writeConfig(EncFSFileProvider fileProvider, EncFSConfig config, String password)
      Create a configuration file from the given EncFSConfig and write it to the root directory of the given EncFSFileProvider
